text: Muminagana, yakhana tomaderake bala hayah majalise sthana prasasta kare da'o, takhana tomara sthana prasasta kare di'o. Allahara jan'ye tomadera jan'ya prasasta kare dibena. Yakhana bala hayah uthe ya'o, takhana uthe yeyo. Tomadera madhye yara imanadara ebam yara jnanaprapta, allaha tadera maryada ucca kare dibena. Allaha khabara rakhena ya kichu tomara kara.
